inclusion.criterion: postoperative patients after placement of midurethral sling
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to provide informed consent and complete all study requirements
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who underwent a surgery that requires long term catheterization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients who sustained a cystotomy during surgery as our divisional protocol is to send these patients home with a Foley catheter for 5-14 days without a voiding trial
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient had severe 'exploding' headache after hitting her head on a cabinet, but was improving with pain medication and ambulating independently.
